title: Auth migration — session management refactor
description: Refactor session management to support the new auth flow. Includes multi-device session handling and token rotation.
notes: Code done but can't test without Redis cluster. Blocked on infrastructure decision.

title: Add rate limiting to public API
description: Implement sliding window rate limiting for public API endpoints. 100 req/min for free tier, 1000 for paid.
notes: Marcus said done in Slack, moved to review in Linear — but task status is still in_progress here.

title: Fix timezone bug in scheduler
description: Recurring events use local time instead of UTC, causing wrong trigger times for users in different timezones.
notes: James says fixed in Slack + added regression tests. Status mismatch — should be 'in review'.

title: Update error messages for auth flow
description: Replace generic 'Auth failed' with specific, actionable error messages.
notes: Marcus says done in Slack. Status mismatch.

title: Dashboard data layer refactor
description: Move dashboard data fetching to the new service pattern. Prep for GraphQL migration.
notes: PR #342 is up. ~800 lines. Needs Alex's review.

title: Redis cluster provisioning for auth
description: Provision Redis cluster (managed or self-hosted) for session storage in the new auth flow.
notes: Blocked: waiting on managed vs self-hosted decision from Alex/David. Tom says 2 hours to provision once decided.

title: Dashboard V2 — design mockups
description: Create 3 layout options for the new analytics dashboard view.
notes: Figma mockups done. Design review scheduled for 3:30pm today.

title: Investigate caching layer race condition
description: The /api/v2/analytics incident revealed a race condition in the caching layer. Needs investigation and potentially a rewrite.
notes: Hot-fixed with a mutex in v2.14.7. James suggested a full caching layer rewrite for Sprint 14.

title: Write incident postmortem — analytics error spike
description: Document root cause, impact, fix, and preventive measures for the Feb 5 /api/v2/analytics incident.
notes: Marcus said he'd write this up today.

title: CI pipeline — fix database container startup
description: Integration tests failing because database container doesn't start. Might be related to staging migration prep.
notes: Tom thinks it's related to his Docker compose changes for staging. Will investigate in morning.

title: GraphQL prototype for dashboard API
description: Build a small proof-of-concept using GraphQL for the analytics query endpoint.
notes: James started this on his own initiative. Not officially scoped — needs PM decision on GraphQL vs REST.

title: MFA rollout planning
description: Plan hardware key distribution and setup sessions for company-wide MFA requirement (March 1 deadline).
notes: David's policy. Tom needs to schedule 2-hour setup sessions for all teams.

title: Update API documentation for v2 endpoints
description: Documentation for the v2 API endpoints is outdated. Needs update to match current implementation.
notes: Deprioritized in Sprint 12. Should be done after data layer refactor is merged.

title: Performance audit — dashboard load time
description: Audit dashboard load times. Users reporting >3s loads on the analytics page. Target: <1.5s for 95th percentile.
notes: User research confirmed this is the #1 complaint. Should be Sprint 14 priority.

title: Export to PDF feature for analytics dashboard
description: Allow users to export analytics views to PDF format.
notes: User research: #1 requested feature. Need to scope and estimate.
